oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bradford County, Athens, Pa., Streets, Maple Street, 0001A
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Commercial use of this image requires permission and may be subject to a fee. Contact Pennsylvania State Archives
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: MG 213, Postcard Collection, Series 1, County File, ca. 1880-present
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Postcard Collection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: postcard, 5 1/2 in. x 3 1/2 in.; This collection of approximately 29,000 postcards from the 1880s to the 1970s includes images from across the U.S. and all 67 Pennsylvania counties and highlights cities, towns, buildings, local businesses and industries, parks, and scenic and street views. Additional images include business and industry advertising, highways, states, and foreign countries.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cities and towns
postcards
Streets
